meanings.definition: The act of saving a website or webpage for future reference.
meanings.sent1: I use bookmarking to save my favorite recipes online.
meanings.sent2: Bookmarking helps me keep track of important websites.
meanings.sent3: My bookmarking skills are so good, I could save the whole internet!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a bookmarking system, neatly categorizing memories for later retrieval.
meanings.sent5: The art of bookmarking is like creating a personal library of the internet.

meanings.definition: A digital tool used to save and organize online content for easy access.
meanings.sent1: With bookmarking, I can easily find all my saved articles.
meanings.sent2: Bookmarking makes it simple to revisit my favorite websites.
meanings.sent3: I wish my brain had a built-in bookmarking feature for all the information I come across.
meanings.sent4: Her bookmarking app was like a virtual filing cabinet, neatly storing all her online resources.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of bookmarking makes online research a breeze.
